function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Close proximity increases the likelihood of disease transmission, especially in shared dwellings and apartment housing.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental and physical health issues due to poor living conditions and lack of physical distancing within shared dwellings.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of surface transmission within apartment buildings due to high-touch surfaces and communal spaces.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to private balconies in housing for the elderly in high-rise residential buildings","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate support for physical distancing in balcony designs","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor green spaces in urban apartment buildings","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on active heating and cooling systems","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in balconies","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High co2 levels, mold, and poor indoor air quality in social housing","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Outbreak of covid-19 in a high-rise apartment building due to unknown cause","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in areas with ideal temperature and humidity for airborne transfer","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residents in buildings with high exterior glazing reporting higher thermal discomfort and health issues","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupant discomfort in apartment housing due to thermal conditions and iaq","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exterior city noise pollution in apartment housing as a source of annoyance that prevents restful sleep.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate daylighting and lack of regulation of human circadian clock due to poor environmental design in residential spaces.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate bedroom design impacting sleep quality","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in apartment design may not effectively mitigate the spread of contagious diseases, leading to increased transmission risk.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate circadian regulation due to poor design of bedrooms, leading to negative impacts on sleep quality and overall health.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate research on flexible apartment design systems may lead to unsatisfactory living spaces in postcovid-19 housing.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor thermal conditions and iaq greatly affect occupant health and productivity","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy within the home","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized metrics for daylighting levels in apartment housing","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of green landscapes and open spaces in apartment housing","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urban densification and obstructed views","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of natural window views and nature experiences in housing design","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to outdoor views during a pandemic","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on directed attention within the built environment","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited published research on covid-19 and housing","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor building design for health","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of restorative environmental design in apartment housing","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical examples of poor housing design leading to disease transmission","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity to other balconies and shared outdoor spaces can increase the risk of disease transmission between residents.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited control over indoor air quality and thermal comfort in small dwellings may lead to poor ventilation and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowded shared spaces such as lobbies, elevators, and laundry rooms can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases among residents.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of variability and variety in lighting levels based on new uses of the home.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate environmental design that does not promote wellbeing and comfort.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-density urban housing does not offer restorative experiences for residents","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased amount of time spent indoors due to pandemic-related city shutdowns","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on occupant wellbeing and health in residential design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of aggregated observation and simulated variables over longer time periods for model calibration may overlook short-term fluctuations and dynamics in disease transmission, leading to limited accuracy in capturing real-time epidemic trends.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited data accuracy or completeness in the epidemiological data and npi timelines from the ministry of health and other sources.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incomplete or delayed implementation of npis in specific regions of saudi arabia.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited research on sars-cov-2 dynamics in gulf states and saudi arabia","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited studies on non-pharmaceutical intervention npi effectiveness in gulf states","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exclusion of gulf states in some global npi effectiveness studies","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality in healthcare buildings and hospitals","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of onsite energy generation, integrated storage units, or grid connection in healthcare buildings","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low performance of domestic hot water systems in healthcare buildings","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underreporting of impacts related to bacs design and automation levels in healthcare buildings","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of proper indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare buildings","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"}]}
